description: Numbers that are congruent to {0, 2, 5} mod 6.
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,0,1,-1).
formula: a(n)= 3*n-3*floor(n/3)-(n^2 mod 3), with offset 0..a(0)=0 [From _Gary Detlefs_, Mar 19 2010]G.f.  x^2*(x+2)*(1+x) / ( (1+x+x^2)*(x-1)^2 ). - R. J. Mathar, Oct 08 2011
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
